WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
I've found a problem when I register WeeklyTrigger on task definition by "AddNew" method with TaskTriggerType.Weekly of Triggers collection of task definition.
When I use this method, in Windows Vista or Windows 7 no problem but in Windows XP, a DailyTrigger is registered.
 
I found a bypass at my problem : I use the "Add" method and build a new WeeklyTrigger object.
 
I attach a demo project sources to demonstrate my problem. This sources has 2 methods called "TheProblem" contains the code with problem and "TheByPass" contains my bypass. They are called in Main method wich build the task definition.
In Windows XP, you can see 2 triggers, first demonstrate my problem and second to demonstrate my temporary solution.
 
thank you.
